name: Amazon Simple Queue Service
description: Amazon SQS offers reliable and scalable hosted queues for storing messages as they travel between computers. By using Amazon SQS, you can move data between distributed components of your applications that perform different tasks without losing messages or requiring each component to be always available. The Amazon SQS connector for WSO2 EI uses the Amazon SQS API and allows you to send and receive messages, facilitating asynchronous messaging between integrated systems.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Config operation

operations.name: sendMessage
operations.description: Delivers a message to the specified queue

operations.name: sendMessageBatch
operations.description: Delivers batch messages to the specified queue

operations.name: receiveMessage
operations.description: Retrieves one or more messages from the specified queue

operations.name: changeMessageVisibility
operations.description: Changes the visibility timeout of a specified message in a queue

operations.name: changeMessageVisibilityBatch
operations.description: Changes the visibility timeout of multiple messages

operations.name: deleteMessage
operations.description: Deletes the specified message from the specified queue

operations.name: deleteMessageBatch
operations.description: Deletes multiple messages from the specified queue

operations.name: addPermission
operations.description: Adds a permission to a queue for a specific principal which allows access sharing to the queue

operations.name: removePermission
operations.description: Revokes any permissions in the queue policy

operations.name: createQueue
operations.description: Creates a new queue, or returns the URL of an existing one

operations.name: getQueueAttributes
operations.description: Gets attributes for the specified queue

operations.name: setQueueAttributes
operations.description: Sets the value of one or more queue attributes

operations.name: getQueueUrl
operations.description: Returns the URL of an existing queue

operations.name: listQueues
operations.description: Returns a list of queues

operations.name: deleteQueue
operations.description: Deletes the queue specified by the queue URL

operations.name: purgeQueue
operations.description: Deletes the messages in a queue specified by the queue URL

operations.name: listDeadLetterSourceQueues
operations.description: Returns a list of your queues that have the RedrivePolicy queue attribute

connections.name: amazonsqs
connections.description: Connection for interacting with Amazon SQS queues.
